TestFrame.Name: SendFrames_WithValues_3CT4VT
TestFrame.Comment: This sequence of frames send from 1 to 9 frames on the process bus towards the 9-2 LE core&#013The NOTSENDx parameters should be set on the number exceeding the frames to be sent.&#013Ex. If 5 frames should be sent on the proccess bus, then NOTSEND6 NOTSEND7 and NOTSEND8 should be set with the comment --. The NOTONLY in the previous example should be set so that NOTONLY5 has &#074SPACE&#076 as argument and all the other NOTONLY have the comment --.&#013
